attributes.action: Not allow a second referendum on EU membership of Great Britain.
attributes.additional_details: The referendum of 26 June 2016 produced a majority wish of the electorate of Great Britain which is a legally binding result
attributes.background:
A referendum on EU membership of Great Britain was held on 23 June 2016. This resulted in a vote to Leave the EU by democratic process.  
We the undersigned wish that this legal and democratic vote should not be challenged or a second referendum allowed.
